bug.author: naveensrinivasan
bug.summary: make all fails with logger not found
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: [A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] The make all fails because this fails to run go build -o bin/logger ./cmd/logger . The cmd does not have logger What did you expect to happen: make to succeed. Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Istio Version: Knative Version: KFServing Version: Kubeflow version: Kfdef:[k8s_istio/istio_dex/gcp_basic_auth/gcp_iap/aws/aws_cognito/ibm] Minikube version: Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
